name: 1010 Pro - Puzzle with Bombs and Lightnings
name_original: 1010 Pro - Puzzle with Bombs and Lightnings
description:
1010 Pro is the ultimate version with bombs and lightnings. It have simple game play and very easy to learn but hart to master.
This is the ultimate mobile puzzle game.
All you do is to drop the colored blocks and when you have a full line, then you will destroy the line - horizontally or vertically.
You can be lucky to get a bomb or even lightning to help you clean up the puzzle.
Are you the 1010 Pro master of all times?
